attributes.action: remove the ban on Mr Geert Wilder from entering the U.K. in the interests of Democracy and Free Speech.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Geert Wilder has preached neither violence nor disorder in his recent film 'Fitna' yet has been banned from the U.K.
This is despite several religious clerics being welcomed here, many of whom have advocated terror, violence and murder against members of other religions.
Whether or not his views are supported, the right to freedom of speech should be upheld.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
